meaningMnemonic: A <radical>leader</radical> and <radical>Wolverine</radical> take a <radical>slide</radical> to <kanji>Italy</kanji>. Wolverine’s leader is Professor X, and they are both sliding down a big slide to Italy. How fun!
readingMnemonic: Before Professor X can get off the slide into <kanji>Italy</kanji>, a large <reading>ea</reading>gle (い) swoops down and plucks him right out of his wheelchair. That eagle is very strong. Goodbye, Professor X!
